body.name: Chefman Air Fryer Toaster Oven Combo with Probe Thermometer, 12-In-1 Stainless Steel Convection Countertop, 10 Inch Pizza, 4 Slices of Toast, Cooking, Baking, Toasting, Roaster Oven Airfryer 20QT
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 12-IN-1: Choose from 12 functions for air fry, toast, broil, bake, dehydrate, and more, with meat, fish, and chicken presets all in one convenient toaster oven air fryer combo.
PERFECTLY COOKED FOODS: The integrated probe meat thermometer displays real-time temperature updates as your food cooks so you never have to guess when you've reached that perfect doneness.

9 ONE-TOUCH PRESETS: Presets include Air Fry, Air Roast, Toast, Bake, Air Broil, Bagel, Air Bake, Reheat, and Dehydrate so you can toast a bagel, air fry French fries, bake cookies, dehydrate fruit and more, all at the touch of a button.

OPTIONS GALORE: Plug in the probe to get automatic cooking options and intuitive presets, or unplug to set your own time, temperature, or presets without the probe plus a customizable temp range from 95˚F to 450˚F helps you perfectly cook just about anything.
ALL THE EXTRAS: Mute alarm, flip reminder, and rest indicator add that extra support for cooking that's catered to your needs.
FAMILY SIZE: This 20-quart large air fryer is thoughtfully designed to cook for a crowd, the spacious 20-quart capacity fits 4 slices of toast, a 10-inch pizza, or a 6-pound chicken.
ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: Dishwasher-safe baking rack, air fry basket, 2 dehydrating racks, broil pan, and probe thermometer are included so you have everything you need to get cooking.
EASY TO CLEAN: Pull-out crumb tray and dishwasher-safe parts make cleaning up this airfryer toaster oven a breeze.
SAFETY FIRST: The air fryer oven comes equipped with advanced over-heat protection and automatic shut-off for added safety.
RESOURCES: UL certified with advanced safety technology for long-lasting durability and a 1-year assurance provided by Chefman, so you can purchase worry-free! 120V/1800W–RJ50-SST2-P.
body.description: With the ExacTemp™ Chefman Oven+Air Fryer you get compact countertop convenience with perfect cooking and time-saving features. The integrated meat thermometer helps cook foods to the perfect doneness with easy presets so you never have to guess. Choose between 9 cooking functions including air fry, air roast, toast, bake air broil, bake, air bake, reheat and dehydrate. Lots of extra features including toasting shades, preset meat options, flip reminder and more allow you to cook according to your preference plus nonstick, dishwasher-safe parts keep clean-up simple. Accessories included. 120V/1800W–RJ50-SST2-P. • 5-in-1 air fryer oven • Integrated meat thermometer • 9 preset cooking functions • 5 toasting shade options • Temperature range from 95°F-450°F • Flip reminder • Rest indicator • Mute alarm • Automatic shut-off • Interior light for easy viewing • Nonstick dishwasher-safe parts • Accessories included (baking rack, air fry basket, 2 dehydrating racks, broil pan, and probe thermometer)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best air fryers we have owned!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This air fryer is so easy to use, cleans easy, and cooks great . We use this for everything and it is large enough to cook for more than 2 people. Fits on our counter top perfectly. One of the best we have had .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressive for a countertop unit
reviews.reviewText: Like: Just fit under my cabinet. Nice look, although not truly black stainless in the true sense. Doesn't match my refer which is a mercury color, but this is plain black, but still looks nice. Nice presets, unlike my last unit which all were set at 400 or 450. Everything so far has turned out perfectly. Toast was just right, huge baked potato baked at only 45 min. at 350 which surprised me. My clam strips were great. Very quiet! That was a relief.Tentative: The temp go up at 25 degrees intervals. Should be at 5 or 10 degrees. Unit lights up well but I was worried that lights would stay on. After 10 minutes or so they all go out except for the Start button. Nothing about this was mentioned in the manual, that I saw. So it's fine but wish they would have mentioned it in the manual. Other than these two things, everything is great and I'd buy it again. Last thing to review will be how long it lasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works so well. I can cook anything with ease. I wish the price point was lower but so far so good. Definitely recommend. I just hope it lasts past a year. My last chefman air fryer died at the year mark.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, good looking air fryer with few flaws.
reviews.reviewText: Fryer looks good, it's stainless steel on the outside, galvanized steel on the inside. It keeps steady, accurate temperature, -15,+5F from what it is set to (measured with digital meat thermometer). It truly can heat up to 450F. While cooking, front and rear get scolding hot, sides and top get warm to touch, handle is cool.All controls on the digital panel are directly select-able, unlike some where one has to flip through options. I would have preferred that temperature and time are displayed next to each other rather than display alternating between time and temperature. At least the numbers are twice as big as usual so they are easy to see from afar. Temperature and/or time can be adjusted during cooking.Unit can barely fit 12" pizza. I have not tried it but there's an indentation in the rear to accommodate a round 12" pie. Just barely though, so it's questionable how well it would cook it. Basket dimensions are 11.5x10". Inside oven dimensions are 12Wx10Dx5H(height from drip pan to heating element).EDIT: dehydrate on 135F setting for 7 hours used 1.5kWh of energy.Even though I have not used it for long, I noticed following shortcomings:- rear is entirely uninsulated, thin single sheet of metal, so it'll have temperature is close to inside- light bulb appears to be impossible to replace- some reviewers have shown picture of burned seal and I believe it's possible with drip pan in lowest position- I saw a picture of rusted crumb tray in one review. Considering that it's a flimsy piece of zinc plated steel I think that's quite possible if cooking salty food that drips and is not cleaned quickly.- I quite dislike when display alternates between temperature and time - even when not in use.- oven lamp does not turn on when door is opened- there is no pause button. Manual tells you to open the door to pause cooking.And, here are positives that I did not mention:- fan is not as loud as other air fryers I tried- the beep sound is not loud and oven does not beep on every key press, plus sound can be completely turned off- touch controls are easy to use and have good sensitivity- cooking pauses when door is open

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OMG I cooked a Steak!!!
reviews.reviewText: This oven has lots of functions and is very easy to program because it is digital. I also love the led light inside. I live alone so I hardly ever actually cook, so I bought this oven with hopes I would cook for myself. I bought a nice steak and decided to use the air broil function. This oven cooked that steak to perfection, even telling me when to turn it. I just wish it was a bit smaller as it takes up a lot of room.I look forward to cooking more often.🙏🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good !
reviews.reviewText: Completely Digital !! We previously had a Cuisinart toaster/air fryer combo unit but it had knobs to turn. The central knob had the controls built into it and the settings would not work unless we pried it with a knife !This unit is completely digital and it has worked very well so far also it was almost half the price of the Cuisinart but much better IMHO. I will be cak to update if necessary. 12/7/2023

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I no longer ruin chicken
reviews.reviewText: I love this oven! It takes all the guess out of how long to cook something. I used to overcook chicken until it was dry and tasteless, but this oven doesn’t let me. Every time I cook chicken, I just hit one button and the oven does the rest - comes out fabulous every time. I have also used the oven to roast vegetables, cook salmon, bake cookies and even make pumpkin bread. This oven bakes them perfectly. The time and temp are easily changed if you need. I haven’t tried all the features, but I love what I have tried. Definitely worth the price!
Puedes Calentar, hornear y tostar cualquier tipo de comida. El pan sale delicioso.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best air fryer, toaster oven, etc.

reviews.reviewText: Love it. It is very quiet, cooks well and we use it alot! Great buy and perfect size for cooking for a family.
Such a potent little oven!Cooks things so fast and easy to use.I got it to replace my bucket style air fryer.This is SO a much better.
